bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: a) of a feeling of sounds in the ears brought forth by a depletion. Ri hua zi zhu jia ben cao 日華子諸家本草 Substance Entry ze xie 澤瀉：主頭旋，耳虛鳴，筋骨攣縮 , “It controls spinning head, depletion rumble in the ears, and contraction of the sinews and bones.

b) Identical with xu hou 虛吼 , depletion roar. Hai yao ben cao 海藥本草 Substance Entry yi zhi zi 益智子：主水腫 浮氣，結聚宿滯不消，腹中 虛鳴 , “It controls water swelling and floating qi, nodular collections that abide, are sluggish, and fail to dissolve, and depletion rumble in the abdomen”.
